Thanks Hirotada Tokugawa for posting this!

For those of us who have Hillsb=
orough's SHINSENGUMI:THE SHOGUN'S LAST
SAMURAI CORPS you may want to compar=
e the info in the post with the
narrative he provided in the chapter "The P=
easant as Feudal Lord"

I have only remembered that Kondou used the name Ok=
ubo Yamato, so I'm
glad Hirotada mentioned that KOndou had also used the na=
me Okubo
Takeshi *earlier
----------------------------
Hirotada Tokugawa wa=
nted to add that:

Akama Shizuko, Shinsengumi Saitou Hajime no Subete. Toky=
o: Shin
Jinbutsu Oraisha, 2003.

was [not] written by Akama.  It is a book =
which collects essays by
several researchers

if you need quick info on Shi=
nsengumi books please visit

ologically and by persona (incomplete)
